title: Bug 17894: Open Mode pref not reset by Restore Defaults
description: When the Open Mode preference is changed to Single Click and the checkboxes are selected, clicking on the 'Restore Defaults' button does not reset the Open Mode preference to Double Click and clear the checkboxes.
OB: The Open Mode preference is not reset to Double Click and the checkboxes are not cleared when 'Restore Defaults' is clicked.
EB: The Open Mode preference should be reset to Double Click and the checkboxes should be cleared when 'Restore Defaults' is clicked.
SR: In the Workbench preferences, after changing the Open Mode to Single Click and selecting both checkboxes, clicking on 'Restore Defaults' should revert the Open Mode to Double Click and clear both checkboxes.
